lead_paragraph: An anticorruption agency said it would appeal the decision to clear Prime Minister Najib Razak of criminal charges over the transfer of $681 million into his personal bank accounts.
snippet: An anticorruption agency said it would appeal the decision to clear Prime Minister Najib Razak of criminal charges over the transfer of $681 million into his personal bank accounts.

headline.main: Malaysia: Agency to Appeal Decision to Clear Premier
headline.print_headline: Asia; Malaysia: Agency to Appeal Decision to Clear Premier

abstract: Malaysia’s Anti-Corruption Commission announces plans to appeal decision by attorney general to clear Prime Min Najib Razak of corruption charges.
